ww_relics:WanderingWarrior.NAME: Wandering Warrior
ww_relics:WanderingWarrior.DESCRIPTION: Gains at start Duffel Bag, Fighting Gloves, Red Headband and loses 35% Max HP.

ww_relics:BlueJade.NAME: Blue Jade
ww_relics:BlueJade.DESCRIPTION: Gains at start Spiky Bracers, White Boots, Handcuffs and loses 35% Max HP.
